normal.speaker: Adira
normal.line: I'm Adira of Templar. I'll never stop until there are no enemies left.

normal.speaker: Adira
normal.line: Have you seen Kiara? She's supposed to be training, not wandering off.

normal.speaker: Adira
normal.line: Discipline is the sword of the righteous. Remember that.

normal.speaker: Adira
normal.line: State your business. I do not have time for idle chatter.

normal.speaker: Adira
normal.line: My duty as Commander is to the order, and to the people. I will not fail.

taunt.speaker: Adira
taunt.line: Don't you dare stand in my path.

taunt.speaker: Adira
taunt.line: This will be your last mistake.

taunt.speaker: Adira
taunt.line: Move aside, or prepare to face your death.

taunt.speaker: Adira
taunt.line: Step aside, Kiara. You donâ€™t need to fight me to prove anything.
